text: Mom and Pop were proud of my popularity, but from their point of view, show business was no way to make a living.
author: Ethel Merman

text: My mom was a professional. My dad and mom met each other in a movie called 'New Faces of 1937.' My mom went under the name Thelma Leeds, and she did a few movies, and she was really a great singer, and when she married my dad and started to have a family, she sang at parties.
author: Albert Brooks

text: I had a non-existent knowledge of Queen Victoria's early years. Like everyone else, I thought of her as an old lady dressed in black. My mom had told me about her, though, that she had a very loving relationship with Albert, that they had lots of kids, and that he died young.
author: Emily Blunt

text: I'm so proud to represent the people of South Florida. I was so honored when President Obama asked me to serve as chair of the Democratic Party. But there's one job I'm even more proud of, and that's being a mom to my three kids, Rebecca, Jake and Shelby.
author: Debbie Wasserman Schultz

text: I have great faith that Heaven's there and I'll see my brothers and my mom and dad when I get there.
author: Ernie Harwell
